channel.title: 笔记 on cyx20080216的小屋
channel.description: Recent content in 笔记 on cyx20080216的小屋

item.title: Ubuntu安装Brave踩坑
item.description: 今天我想在我的Ubuntu上装Brave，于是找到官方文档，按照要求执行如下命令 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 sudo apt install apt-transport-https curl sudo curl -fsSLo /usr/share/keyrings/brave-browser-archive-keyring.gpg https://brave-browser-apt-release.s3.brave.com/brave-browser-archive-keyring.gpg echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/brave-browser-archive-keyring.gpg arch=amd64] https://brave-browser-apt-release.s3.brave.com/ stable main"|sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/brave-browser-release.list sudo apt
